post_title: WTB: T206 Cobb Red/Green Portrait - SGC or PSA 1, 1.5 or 2
post_content:
Looking to buy a nice red or green cobb, SGC and PSA slabbed only. Not interested in Authentic examples, and likely only a 1, 1.5 or 2 (or maybe better). 

Looking for centered examples only. I have a small budget, but can probably pay between $3,500 to $5,000 depending on how nice the card is. 

Also open to Green Cobbs but am aware of the price hike there at the moment. 

Thanks, 
Mark
I have one up for sale in the BST. Has always been raw. But most likely an A.
Thanks so much for letting me know; just looking for graded ones at the moment. My thanks, Mark
Your budget would need to increase.  Pm me your email if that's a possibility for you.
I’ve got a Red Ty Cobb portrait PSA 2.5- Old Mill back-no creases-very centered. Asking 13k if you are ever interested-pm me
